channel.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
channel.description: What is the best way to give money or items to a main from a macroing account? Drop trading, 3rd party trading, etc?

item.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

still, drop trade is the way to go

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

The safeest way i have found is to duel you items to trade between accounts. set weps on and only give the reciever a wep. Jagex wont be detecting for that or they would have to investigate every staked duel in the game.

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs

item.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
item.dc:creator: @saltnpepper saltnpepper
item.description:
@saltnpepper wrote:

pk trade doesn’t work well if you have high level account and one noob account… the level difference would mean you’d have either go deep in wildy… or can’t even do it all. But if levels are close then it’s fine, but I mostly drop trade, can’t be bothered to double login due to lag.

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs

item.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

2142:

Nice ways to transfer stuff. But i just get my laptop and my desktop together. Get my desktop onto another account, used my laptop to get onto my neighbor’s internet, which is not secured :D. Hook both up to runescape. Log in, and trade away…But thanks for the VNC link. I’ll check it out.

Saves walking back and fourth.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
item.dc:creator: @phonnygoblin phonnygoblin
item.description:
@phonnygoblin wrote:

i have 2 comps but i can rarely use them at the same time. So when i drop trade i drop some from each account telling people my bro gave it to me. Then when jagex bans me i appeal it by saying we were just trading and we cant afford another computer. LOL.

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs

item.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Erj:

Double logins, get the giver to give: Money,food, n00b items. Taker give: Bronze and/or iron and stuff like that.

Hes right…What he means is go onto the noob, put 1m in the trade window, and on the main, put up bronze, feathers, tinderbox, etc. It cuts down on Jagex tracking you being that it is more like a real trade.

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs

item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

So really you meant “use another PC”. That’s all well and good if you have another computer that happens to be not at your house…

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs

item.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
item.dc:creator: @Morgoth Morgoth
item.description:
@Morgoth wrote:

VNC really is not a virtual PC. It’s like remote admin. Once run a VNC server on a computer, you can connect to it from any other computer (assuming it is connected to net, of course), and use the server computer’s desktop remotely.
And yes, it is better than double logging, because, if you have like the one computer at home, second at work or school, the trade looks completely legit because of different IP’s. I deem that Jagex looks more closely at any same IP trades. And you don’t have to use some socks proxy located in China (it also looks funny to Jagex, how your account is being logged in from multiple countries in a very short period of time).

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs

item.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

VNC has nothing to do with virtual pc’s… and I fail to see how it really has anything to do with double logging.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to transfer items/money btw. accs
item.dc:creator: @uncfan1119 uncfan1119
item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

VNC has a wide range of applications including system administration, IT support and helpdesks. It can also be used to support the mobile user, both for hot desking within the enterprise and also to provide remote access at home, or on the road. The system allows several connections to the same desktop, providing an invaluable tool for collaborative or shared working in the workplace or classroom. Computer support within the geographically spread family is an ever popular use.

The open source version of VNC has been freely available since 1998, and more than 100 million copies of the software have been downloaded. The software has also appeared on numerous magazine cover disks, and for several years all popular versions of Linux have included VNC. It is in active use by many millions in industry, commerce, education and at home. Virtually all Fortune 500 companies use VNC, and installations of VNC across thousands of workstations are commonplace.

AKA if your dumb enough to not know how to double log, use w\e the hell this is. PS, i didn’t read it.

Read full topic
